mapper.insert: INSERT INTO messages (sender_id, detail, sent_time, last_updated_time, ref_cnt) VALUES (#{senderId}, #{detail}, #{sentTime}, #{lastUpdatedTime}, #{refCnt});
INSERT INTO message_boxes (message_id, receiver_id, is_read, last_updated_time) VALUES (#{messageId}, #{receiverId}, #{isRead}, #{lastUpdatedTime});
mapper.update: UPDATE messages SET sender_id=#{senderId}, detail=#{detail}, sent_time=#{sentTime}, last_updated_time=#{lastUpdatedTime}, ref_cnt=#{refCnt} WHERE id=#{id};
UPDATE messages SET ref_cnt=ref_cnt+#{step} WHERE id=#{id};
UPDATE messages SET ref_cnt=ref_cnt-#{step} WHERE id=#{id};
